original_title: Adam & Eve's Guide to the Kama Sutra
overview: The Kama Sutra is an ancient Indian Hindu text widely considered to be the standard work on human sexual behavior. Adam & Eve Pictures presents a visually stunning and informative guide to this ancient text. Through the artistic eye of Francois Clousot comes a guide in the art of sensual lovemaking. Numerous techniques of the Kama Sutra are explored and demonstrated from the most novice to the more advanced positions.
tagline: 25 Legendary sexual positions from the original Kama Sutra!
title: Adam & Eve's Guide to the Kama Sutra
